title: Error in nn.MaxPool3d() ?
body_html:
• OS:centos 6
  • PyTorch version:0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):pip
  • Python version:3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:8.0/6

when specify the padding=1 in MaxPool3d(), It will raise error.
`In [1]: import torch

In [2]: input = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 75, 50, 100, 3), requires_grad=False)

In [3]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2))

In [4]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))

In [5]: out.shape
Out[5]: torch.Size([1, 3, 75, 25, 50])

In [6]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2), padding=1)
In [7]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))`
will raise error like this
*** glibc detected *** /home/xiejiliang/miniconda3/bin/python: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fdf21090d40 ***
======= Backtrace: =========

body_text:
OS:centos 6
PyTorch version:0.3.1
How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):pip
Python version:3.6.4
CUDA/cuDNN version:8.0/6


when specify the padding=1 in MaxPool3d(), It will raise error.
`In [1]: import torch
In [2]: input = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 75, 50, 100, 3), requires_grad=False)
In [3]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2))
In [4]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))
In [5]: out.shape
Out[5]: torch.Size([1, 3, 75, 25, 50])
In [6]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2), padding=1)
In [7]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))`
will raise error like this
*** glibc detected *** /home/xiejiliang/miniconda3/bin/python: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fdf21090d40 ***

body:
- OS:centos 6
- PyTorch version:0.3.1
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):pip
- Python version:3.6.4
- CUDA/cuDNN version:8.0/6
-------------------------------------------------------
when specify the `padding=1` in `MaxPool3d()`, It will raise error.
 `In [1]: import torch

In [2]: input = torch.autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 75, 50, 100, 3), requires_grad=False)

In [3]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2))

In [4]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))

In [5]: out.shape
Out[5]: torch.Size([1, 3, 75, 25, 50])

In [6]: m = torch.nn.MaxPool3d(kernel_size=(1,2,2), stride=(1,2,2), padding=1)
In [7]: out = m(input.permute(0, 4, 1, 2, 3))`
will raise error like this
*** glibc detected *** /home/xiejiliang/miniconda3/bin/python: free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fdf21090d40 ***
